datafield.subfield: Amplitude analysis of the decay $\overline{B}^0 \to K_{S}^0 \pi^+ \pi^-$ and first observation of the CP asymmetry in $\overline{B}^0 \to K^{*}(892)^- \pi^+$
First measurement of the $CP$-violating phase $\phi_s^{d\overline{d}}$ in $B_s^0\to(K^+\pi^-)(K^-\pi^+)$ decays
Studies of the resonance structure in $D^{0} \rightarrow K^\mp \pi ^\pm \pi ^\pm \pi ^\mp $ decays
Evidence for the rare decay $\Sigma^+ \to p \mu^+ \mu^-$
Search for the rare decay $\Lambda_{c}^{+} \to p\mu^+\mu^-$
Measurement of $CP$ asymmetry in $B_s^0 \to D_s^{\mp} K^{\pm}$ decays
A measurement of the $CP$ asymmetry difference in $\varLambda_{c}^{+} \to pK^{-}K^{+}$ and $p\pi^{-}\pi^{+}$ decays
Search for $B_c^+$ decays to two charm mesons
Updated determination of $D^0$-$\overline{D}{}^0$ mixing and CP violation parameters with $D^0\to K^+\pi^-$ decays
First observation of $B^{+} \to D_s^{+}K^{+}K^{-}$ decays and a search for $B^{+} \to D_s^{+}\phi$ decays
Measurement of the ratio of branching fractions $\mathcal{B}(B_c^+\,\to\,J/\psi\tau^+\nu_\tau)$/$\mathcal{B}(B_c^+\,\to\,J/\psi\mu^+\nu_\mu)$
Measurement of branching fractions of charmless four-body $\Lambda_b^0$ and $\Xi_b^0$ decays
Test of Lepton Flavor Universality by the measurement of the $B^0 \to D^{*-} \tau^+ \nu_{\tau}$ branching fraction using three-prong $\tau$ decays
Measurements of the branching fractions of $\Lambda_{c}^{+} \rightarrow p \pi^{-} \pi^{+}$, $\Lambda_{c}^{+} \rightarrow p K^{-} K^{+}$, and $\Lambda_{c}^{+} \rightarrow p \pi^{-} K^{+}$
Measurement of the $B^{\pm}$ production cross-section in pp collisions at $\sqrt{s} =$ 7 and 13 TeV
Search for the lepton-flavour violating decays B$_{(s)}^{0} \to e^{\pm}\mu^{\mp}$
Search for Dark Photons Produced in 13 TeV $pp$ Collisions
Measurement of $CP$ observables in $B^{\pm} \rightarrow D K^{*\pm}$ decays using two- and four-body $D$ final states
$\chi_{c1}$ and $\chi_{c2}$ Resonance Parameters with the Decays $\chi_{c1,c2}\to J/\psi\mu^+\mu^-$
Measurement of $CP$ violation in $B^0\rightarrow J/\psi K^0_\mathrm{S}$ and $B^0\rightarrow\psi(2S) K^0_\mathrm{S}$ decays
First observation of forward $Z \rightarrow b \bar{b}$ production in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=8$ TeV
Measurement of the shape of the $\Lambda_b^0\to\Lambda_c^+ \mu^- \overline{\nu}_{\mu}$ differential decay rate
Bose-Einstein correlations of same-sign charged pions in the forward region in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 7 TeV
Measurement of the $\Upsilon$ polarizations in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ and 8 TeV
First Observation of the Rare Purely Baryonic Decay $B^0\to p\bar p$
Measurement of the ratio of the $B^0 \to D^{*-} \tau^+ \nu_{\tau}$ and $B^0 \to D^{*-} \mu^+ \nu_{\mu}$ branching fractions using three-prong $\tau$-lepton decays
Measurement of $CP$ observables in $B^\pm \to D^{(*)} K^\pm$ and $B^\pm \to D^{(*)} \pi^\pm$ decays
Study of $b\bar{b}$ correlations in high energy proton-proton collisions
Observation of $D^0$ meson decays to $\pi^+\pi^-\mu^+\mu^-$ and $K^+K^-\mu^+\mu^-$ final states
Study of prompt D$^{0}$ meson production in $p$Pb collisions at $ \sqrt{s_{\mathrm{NN}}}=5 $ TeV
Updated branching fraction measurements of $B^0_{(s)} \to K_{\mathrm{\scriptscriptstyle S}}^0 h^+ h^{\prime -}$ decays
Observation of the doubly charmed baryon $\Xi_{cc}^{++}$
Prompt and nonprompt J/$\psi$ production and nuclear modification in $p$Pb collisions at $\sqrt{s_{\text{NN}}}= 8.16$ TeV
Study of charmonium production in ${b}$-hadron decays and first evidence for the decay ${{{B}} ^0_{{s}}} \!\rightarrow \phi \phi \phi $
Improved limit on the branching fraction of the rare decay ${{K} ^0_{\mathrm { \scriptscriptstyle S}}} \rightarrow \mu ^+\mu ^-$
Updated search for long-lived particles decaying to jet pairs
Test of lepton universality with $B^{0} \rightarrow K^{*0}\ell^{+}\ell^{-}$ decays
Observation of charmless baryonic decays $B^0_{(s)} \to p \bar{p} h^+ h^{\prime-}$
Resonances and $CP$ violation in $B_s^0$ and $\overline{B}_s^0 \to J/\psi K^+K^-$ decays in the mass region above the $\phi(1020)$
First observation of a baryonic $B_s^0$ decay
Observation of the decays $\Lambda_b^0 \to \chi_{c1} p K^-$ and $\Lambda_b^0 \to \chi_{c2} p K^-$
Measurement of $B^0$, $B^0_s$, $B^+$ and $\Lambda^0_b$ production asymmetries in 7 and 8 TeV proton-proton collisions
Measurement of the $B^0_s\to\mu^+\mu^-$ branching fraction and effective lifetime and search for $B^0\to\mu^+\mu^-$ decays
Observation of five new narrow $\Omega_c^0$ states decaying to $\Xi_c^+ K^-$
Observation of the decay $\Lambda^0_b \to p K^- \mu^+ \mu^-$ and a search for $C\!P$ violation
Observation of the decay $B_{s}^{0} \to \eta_{c} \phi$ and evidence for $B_{s}^{0} \to \eta_{c} \pi^{+} \pi^{-} $
Measurement of the $C\!P$ violation parameter $A_\Gamma$ in $D^0 \to K^+K^-$ and $D^0 \to \pi^+\pi^-$ decays
Observation of the suppressed decay $\Lambda^{0}_{b}\rightarrow p\pi^{-}\mu^{+}\mu^{-}$
Study of the $D^0 p$ amplitude in $\Lambda_b^0\to D^0 p \pi^-$ decays
Measurement of the $B^{\pm}$ production asymmetry and the $CP$ asymmetry in $B^{\pm} \to J/\psi K^{\pm}$ decays
Observation of the $\varXi^{-}_{b}\to J/\psi\varLambda K^{-}$ decay
Study of J/ψ Production in Jets
Measurement of $CP$ asymmetries in $D^{\pm}\rightarrow \eta^{\prime} \pi^{\pm}$ and $D_s^{\pm}\rightarrow \eta^{\prime} \pi^{\pm}$ decays
